description: Abigail Adams introduces readers to the second First Lady of the United States. Students will learn about Abigail's ideas and how she helped shape the future of America. The simple text and interesting pictures will keep students engaged while supporting emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students the skill of sequencing events as well as asking and answering questions to better understand text. The book and lesson are also available for levels H and N.
